title: Nine Inch Nails - The Inevitable Crash
description:
Release type:___Fan Remix Compilation
Date of release:___02-04-08
Group:___Useless:C0mpilations
Individual:___foog

Album Title:___The Inevitable Crash
Artist:___Nine Inch Nails
Year:___2008
Tracks:

1. A Violent Fluid (Diacetylmorphine by Unkown)
2. I Do Not Want This (Something That Matters by DJ Wretched) 
3. The Becoming (Treason by Sam I Am)
4. Burn (Burned and Fucked by J Mix)
5. Heresy (Gristle by DJ Lee)
6. Closer (Desperation by Unknown)
7. Ruiner (Ruin It All 666 V2 by J Mix)
8. The Perfect Drug (Sine Wave by Flim)
9. Hurt (Hurt With Bowie by Rowbes)
10. Eraser (Totally ReErased by Unknown)
11. The Downward Spiral (The Breakdown Spiral by DJ Angel Makris)

Information:
	
	Well here is another remix album. I recieved some criticism on my Year Zero compilation. Despite that I decided to do another of The Downward Spiral. These are my favorite fan mixed tracks. As always the ID3 tags are edited to I hope perfection and it comes with cover art. The tracks are positioned to flow nicely.
	I will be making compilations of all the NIN albums if there are sufficient remixes of the songs of the albums. I also have a few other projects being put together right now such as a rarities compilation and a mashup of Year Zero.
		
Farewell: Hope you enjoy. This is the Seventh release. 

Credits to: Everyone who was behind making these tracks. To the unkown girl taking a picture of Jesus on her trip to Italy. As always if you have had any hand in creating these tracks please come forward so credit can be given.

Releases:
1_Guns N&#039; Roses - Appetite for Democracy
2_Metallica - "The New Album" (Live Bootlegs)
3_Nine Inch Nails - Holding_On
4_Trent Reznor/Peter Murphy - Radioshows
5_Red Hot Chili Peppers - Stadium Arcadium: Venus (B-Sides Compilation)
6_Nine Inch Nails - Y34RZ3R0F4NR3M1X3D
7_Nine Inch Nails - The Inevitable Crash
